content.text: Transparent and prudent financial management is essential for the sustainability of the school. The school operates on an annual budget approved by the Board.

content.title: Key Procedures
items: Budgeting: Departments submit budget requests annually.
Purchasing: Competitive bidding required for major procurement; purchase orders must be approved before spending.
Petty Cash: Managed strictly for small, incidental expenses.
Auditing: Annual external financial audits to ensure compliance.

content.text: Providing a safe, clean, and conducive learning environment is a priority.

content.title: Maintenance Schedule
rows: Cleaning of classrooms, toilets, and common areas; hygiene checks.
Grounds maintenance; check of AC units and lighting.
Safety inspections (fire extinguishers, electrical systems, playground equipment).
Major repairs, painting, and renovations during school holidays.

content.text: All school assets must be tagged and recorded in the Asset Register. An annual stocktake is conducted to verify inventory.

items: Security: 24/7 security personnel; visitor management system (ID badges).
Emergency Drills: Fire and earthquake drills conducted at least once per term.
First Aid: Qualified nurse on site; first aid kits available in key locations.
Canteen: Regular hygiene inspections of food preparation areas.
